enum.name: FoundBuyableProductAnnotation
enum.summary: Whether a buyable product annotation was found in the response from an endpoint which provides page metadata in ShoppingPersistedTabData.

int.label: New tab button in toolbar for touch
New tab button in the WebUI tab strip

enum.name: PullDownGestureAction
enum.summary: The type of action performed on the overscroll UI.
enum.int: The user selected the new tab action.
The user selected the refresh action.
The user selected the close tab action.
The user canceled the action by scrolling back up.

int.label: Activate the context menu of a tab

enum.name: TabManagerTabRankerResult
enum.int: The ExamplePreprocessorConfig could not be loaded or parsed.
The ExamplePreprocessor returned an error other than, or in addition to, the kNoFeatureIndexFound error.

enum.name: TabOrganizationTriggerOutcome
enum.int: User clicked through the nudge UI.
User explicitly dismissed the nudge UI.
The timeout elapsed without user interaction.

enum.name: TabOrganizationUserChoice
enum.int: The session was destroyed before the organization had a choice.

enum.name: TabScreenshotAction
enum.int: User made a screenshot, but did not take any actions with it before navigating away or closing the tab.
User took a screenshot then tried to share.
User was provided in product help for Downloads after taking a screenshot.

enum.name: TabSearchCloseActions

int.label: User did not close via Tab Search UI

enum.int: The UI was dismissed via interactions outside what is offered by the Tab Search UI.

int.label: User switched to an open tab

enum.int: The Tab Search UI was dismissed as a result of the user opting to switch to a currently open tab.

int.label: User opened the Tab Search UI via a mouse click
User opened the Tab Search UI via keyboard navigation
User opened the Tab Search UI via keyboard shortcut
User opened the Tab Search UI via touch gesture
Opened a recently closed item from an unfiltered item list
Opened a recently closed item from a filtered item list
Expand the recently closed items section
Collapse the recently closed items section
Switch to tab from unfiltered tab list
Switch to tab from filtered search tab list
Reloaded due to cold start (fg tab on start)
Reloaded due to cold start (bg tab on switch)
Lazy load for 'Open in new tab'
Stopped due to page loading when backgrounding
Evicted due to page loading when backgrounding
Evicted due to OS terminating the renderer.
